languages.text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

traits.locale_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

languages.text: Максимальное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа зависит от его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}. Каждая {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусная{/g} единица Выносливости дает +10% к общему значению здоровья.
languages.original_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

traits.locale_text: Максимальное количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа зависит от его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}. Каждая {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусная{/g} единица Выносливости дает +10% к общему значению здоровья.

Максимальное количество {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа зависит от его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}. Каждая {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусная{/g} единица Выносливости дает +10% к общему значению здоровья.

languages.text: Die maximale Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Charakters hängt von seiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} ab. Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonuspunkt{/g} an Zähigkeit erhält der Charakter +10 % Wunden.
languages.original_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

traits.locale_text: Die maximale Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines Charakters hängt von seiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} ab. Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonuspunkt{/g} an Zähigkeit erhält der Charakter +10 % Wunden.

languages.text: Le nombre maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} dont dispose un personnage dans sa réserve dépend de son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. Pour chaque point {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'Endurance, les personnages reçoivent +10 % de blessures.
languages.original_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

traits.locale_text: Le nombre maximum de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} dont dispose un personnage dans sa réserve dépend de sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}. Pour chaque point {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Résistance, les personnages reçoivent +10 % de blessures.

languages.text: 角色的最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}取决于角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}属性。每有1点坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色的生命值就会提高10%。
languages.original_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

traits.locale_text: 角色的最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}取决于角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}属性。每有1点坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色的生命值就会提高10%。

languages.text: キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の最大量はそのキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}に依存する。耐久力の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ポイント1つにつき、キャラクターの傷が+10％得る。
languages.original_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の最大量はそのキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}に依存する。耐久力の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ポイント1つにつき、キャラクターの傷が+10％得る。

languages.text: La cantidad máxima de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un personaje depende de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Resistencia, el personaje gana un +10 % de heridas.
languages.original_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.

traits.locale_text: La cantidad máxima de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un personaje depende de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}. Por cada punto de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Resistencia, el personaje gana un +10 % de heridas.

languages.text: Bir karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliğine bağlı olarak değişen maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} miktarı. Karakter sahip olduğu her ilave Dayanıklılık puanı ile +%10 sağlık kazanır.
languages.original_text: The maximum amount of a character's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} depends on their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Toughness, characters gain +10% wounds.
